creator: costinarsene@yahoo.com
text:
Hello ,

I have a feature that will help me a lot in deploying war applications.
We have several war's that share the same jars.

We wanted to store these common jars in a war (that contains only common  jars)
and to be referenced from other wars.

We do not want to put these jars in tomcat\lib folder or other shared folder because these jars might change in the future and we must reinstall tomcat with that versions of jars.

Thank you in advance and ....

Sorry for my bad English :|

This feature will help us a lot.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Upgrade to Tomcat 8 and use the new resources implementation.

There are probably ways to do it with the VirtualWebappLoader as well (for Tomcat 7.0.x). Ask on the users list if you need configuration help with this.

text:
Thank you for your quick response. It will be very helpful if you can send me an example for Tomcat 8.

Many thanks in advance :)
